description: Potential clients want to contact you! Get more leads by updating your contact information, including your email and phone number.
Complete your profile by adding practice areas, a website, awards, and more! A higher completion percentage means more leads.
Add a profile photo to build trust with your clients. Profiles with a high-quality photo get more leads and enjoy higher conversion rates
Start maximizing your profile benefits. We have four phases we suggest doing this in, so don't worry if the process takes some time.
Requesting client reviews is one of the best ways to showcase your professional services for future clients.  Don’t worry – we only permit reviews from actual clients.
Any lawyer with a verified Justia Profile can leave you a review if they are familiar with your work. Requesting these reviews is easy with a simple email invite.
Justia Platinum Placements are an exclusive, top placement in the Justia Lawyer Directory, and only one is available per practice area/metro combination.
Justia Gold Placements increase your visibility through sponsored placements that rotate above and among the organic listings in the Justia Lawyer Directory.
All Justia Premium Placements also give you access to your profile traffic statistics for the Justia Lawyer Directory and Legal Information Institute (LII) Directory.
Members who purchase a Justia Platinum Placement can also take advantage of a customized, Justia Landing Page that is designed for maximum conversions.

Answer questions and showcase your legal knowledge to potential clients through our Justia Ask A Lawyer forum, where you can reach people who may currently have a pressing legal matter and future users.

Annotate case law to share your knowledge with other attorneys, legal researchers, and the general public. Sharing your expertise has the added benefit of helping you build your reputation online and reach more clients.
Visit your Justia Connect membership dashboard to manage your exclusive features and benefits.
Activate your free savings and discounts on business services, travel and hotels, technology, and more.
Upgrade to the enhanced Justia Profile to ensure your contact information is prominently displayed while removing competitor ads.
Pick a client review of your choice and peer review from another attorney to feature before other reviews on your profile in the Justia Lawyer Directory.
Visit your Justia Connect membership dashboard to manage your exclusive features and benefits.
Activate your free savings and discounts on business services, travel and hotels, technology, and more.
Visit your Justia Connect membership dashboard to manage your exclusive features and benefits.
Activate your free savings and discounts on business services, travel and hotels, technology, and more.
Take advantage of your enhanced profile and make the most of your prominently displayed contact information by ensuring it is complete and remains accurate.
Make a great first impression by choosing an excellent client review and peer review from another attorney to feature on your Justia Profile.
